729356f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Road - Summit Avenue
729356f-a.text:
(1)
69 Richmond Road, at the N.E. corner of Summit Ave., showing
the Fountain House, after extensive alterations. It was built in
1670. Here Margaret Moncrieffe met Captain Coghlan; here, Also,
Lieutenant Sidney A. Simons, U.S.N.,was born.
62087e
By Eugene G. Putnam.
Courtesy Staten Island Museum
through P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
Another view of the house from the opposite direction on
Richmond Road.
1924.
P. L. Sperr.
NO RE RODUCTIONS.
729356f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Summit Avenue, Staten Island, NY
